code: /** @format */import React from"react";import firebase from"../../firebase/firebase";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{openRecipe}from"../../slices/recipe.slice";import{Card,Button}from"react-bootstrap";import{MoreHoriz}from"@material-ui/icons";import DropdownButton from"../dropdown/dropdown.component";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var SavedRecipeCard=function SavedRecipeCard(props){var dispatch=useDispatch();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DropdownButton,{id:props.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{style:{height:"20rem",objectFit:"cover"},variant:"top",src:props.imageUrl}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:props.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:props.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{style:{width:"100%"},variant:"outline-primary",onClick:function onClick(){dispatch(openRecipe(props));},children:"Open Recipe"})]})]});};export default SavedRecipeCard;
